revised_title: Advances in Low-Cost Optical Fibre Fabrication Techniques
tldr: This article discusses the advancements in low-cost optical fiber fabrication techniques, focusing on the vapor deposition process and its variations, such as MCVD and PCVD. It also explores other bulk approaches like sol-gel fabrication and fiber drawing processes. The article highlights the importance of large preforms in reducing costs and improving fiber quality.
